resources.string:
"Die Vollständige Sicherung benötigt eine Verbindung zu einenm PC, möchten Sie dies zulassen?
If you did not request the backup yourself, do not allow the operation to proceed."
Passwort hier eintragen, falls Sie die Sicherung verschlüsseln wollen:
Since your device is encrypted, you are required to encrypt your backup. Please enter a password below:
Please enter a password to use for encrypting the full backup data. If this is left blank, your current backup password will be used:
Please enter your current backup password below:
Please enter your device encryption password below. This will also be used to encrypt the backup archive.
Please enter your device encryption password below.

"A full restore of all data from a connected desktop computer has been requested. Do you want to allow this to happen?
If you did not request the restore yourself, do not allow the operation to proceed. This will replace any data currently on the device!"
Passwort hier eintragen, falls die Sicherung verschlüsselt wurde:
